column5: looking for opinions on a good battery that will last a few years and where to get it thanks

ENERGIZER at wally world. they run about 100.00 and are a real good battery. I have three of them in my bass boat and no issues going on three yrs. As a matter of fact I checked them for charge on the weekend and they are all fully charged after sitting in a garage all winter without charging.
Hey what is the warranty on the Energizer deep cycles? Parents need a battery and this sounds like the easiest and cost-effective option for where they are located.
INTERSTATE  have used them and sold them for some years now and have had no issues with them
Optimas batteries...expensive but they do hold a charge really well
Interstate marine batteries my friend.compared to the ctc brand.They were cheaper and more bang for the buck.
